Address, , direction ofMovement and much more•         Distance of bus stop from the bus and Estimated time of arrival of bus on the stop based on liveTraffic conditions on route between bus and parent's stop•         Parents can call the school bus staff directly through the App (Attendant/Conductor/TransportManager•         Notification messages for bus departure from school and arrival at the bus stops in afternoon
